org.thegalactic.io

Interface Writer<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - The class of elements to write

    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrowRelationSerializerTeX, ConceptLatticeSerializerDot, ContextSerializerBurmeister, ContextSerializerCsv, ContextSerializerFIMI, ContextSerializerSLF, ContextSerializerText, DGraphSerializerDot, ImplicationalSystemSerializerText

    public interface Writer<E>

    This interface defines a standard way for writing a context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void write(E e, BufferedWriter file)
      Write a context to a file.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(E e,
           BufferedWriter file)
    throws IOException

        Write a context to a file.

        Parameters:
        e - an element to write
        file - a file
        Throws:
        IOException - When an IOException occurs
